name: CKFetchRecordZonesOperation
desc: An operation for retrieving record zones from a database.

items.name: init(recordZoneIDs: [CKRecordZone.ID])
items.desc: Creates an operation for fetching the specified record zones.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an empty fetch zones operation.

items.name: class func fetchAllRecordZonesOperation() -> Self
items.desc: Returns an operation for fetching all record zones in the current database.

items.name: var recordZoneIDs: [CKRecordZone.ID]?
items.desc: The IDs of the record zones to retrieve.

items.name: var fetchRecordZonesCompletionBlock: (([CKRecordZone.ID : CKRecordZone]?, Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The closure to execute after CloudKit retrieves all of the record zones.
